author: g11tech
content: this looks to be a different problem, other pairs are way past block 640, may be the db corruption from previous image

author: tersec
content:
once you do, the Nimbus container also needs to be restarted, since
https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/blob/v1.4.0-beta.2/sync/optimistic.md#transitioning-from-valid---invalidated-or-invalidated---valid
> Transitioning from VALID -> INVALIDATED or INVALIDATED -> VALID
> 
> These operations are purposefully omitted. It is outside of the scope of the specification since it's only possible with a faulty EE.
> 
> Such a scenario requires manual intervention.

author: tersec
content: Generally speaking, fake-`INVALID` is from the CL side probably the least automatically recoverable EL error I've seen so far
